name: Foxhole
description: Foxhole is a massively multiplayer game where you will work with hundreds of players to shape the outcome of a persistent online war. Every individual soldier is a player that contributes to the war effort through logistics, base building, reconnaissance, combat, and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual-Core 64-bit Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHZ CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 11 compatible video card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
